lankawe aarthikaye thibena wyuhathmaka prashnaya nishpadanaya matha padanam wu aarthikayak wardhanaya nowima matha padanam wenawa.ee sakachchawa wenama sakachchawak.kohoma wunath abhyanthara nishpadanaya nanwimak rahithawa sewa wiyukthiya ho duppathkama pilibada prashna wisadanna awasthawa labenne naha.80 dashakaye sita lankawe palaka kotas samajaya muhuna dena wirakshawa ha duppathkama wani gatalu walata muhuna dena aamar eka bawata pathkaragaththe siwil yuddhayayi.samaja prashna gana dakune samajayen masiwili enawita witeka yappu swarayen ha witeka tharjanathmaka swarayen rajaya gena withthiwachakaya wune uthure pawathina yuda gatumayi.eka paththakin tharunayanta rakiya dima sadaha meya madhyayak wuna.aneth athata wiyadam kapuwoth ambau nasi badu kapuwoth tho nasi suthraya nisa wardhanaya wena samaja asahanaya palanaya kirime kramawedaya widihata siwil yuddhaya yodaganuna.

itha wishishtayi saho....karunu niwaradiyi.hondin kiyawannekuta therenawa ehi anthawadi lesa karunu dakwimak nomathi bawa.mama kamathiyi,"dutugamunu saha nandimithra" pilibanda wu sanwadayata.aththatama sidu wuyeth eyayi.yuda samaye apa dutu wiruwa noweyi deshapalana wedikawe sitiye.bankoloth deshapalana awasthawadinta goduru wu "his charithayak" witharayi fonseka.
